meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with the anatomy, functions, and diseases of the eye.
meanings.sent1: Ophthalmology helps doctors understand how our eyes work.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in ophthalmology to help people with eye problems.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmology class was so interesting that even the students with perfect vision were captivated.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ophthalmology, the eye is like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of ophthalmology lies in unraveling the mysteries of vision.

meanings.definition: The study and treatment of disorders and diseases of the eye.
meanings.sent1: Ophthalmology is crucial for diagnosing and treating eye conditions.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a specialized department dedicated to ophthalmology.
meanings.sent3: When the clown visited the ophthalmology clinic, he couldn't stop making eye puns.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to ophthalmology shines through in her meticulous care for every patient.
meanings.sent5: The impact of ophthalmology on improving vision cannot be overstated.
